turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order some pizzas for an upcoming event.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, there is no problem with that. How many pizzas do you plan to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order ten pizzas from the Pizza Hut on Seventh Street in Denver, Colorado.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is this order for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am having a work gathering this evening at the company's headquarter.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of pizza are you interested?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order ten Pepperoni Pizza and make them all large for size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else would you like to order or include in your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to include some breads on the side if they have any available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will include that in the order as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good for the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else would you be interested to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that is all I have for now, but I will let you know if I have anything else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any cheese and pepper packages.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have those when I pick up the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will let them know to include those as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please include napkins for around 15 people.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will also include that in the order as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all I have for the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I just made the order and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.
